inclusion.criterion: Patient meets clinical eligibility to receive rifaximin-α 550 mg in the opinion of the participating physician, regardless of HE treatment actually received.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: West Haven Conn score of ≥2 at time of study entry (i.e. at provision of informed consent);
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Mental health disorder such as dementia or psychosis which makes diagnoses of HE questionable;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CLL and large cell transformation, with recent worsening lymphadenopathy. He has not had a significant response to previous treatments.
